00009         class Namespace_Annotation_AClass extends Annotation {}
00010         class AClass {}
00011 
00012         
00013         class TestOfAddendum extends UnitTestCase {
00014                 public function testClassResolverShouldFindClassBasedOnName() {
00015                         $this->assertEqual(Addendum::resolveClassName('SimpleClass'), 'SimpleClass');
00016                 }       
00017                 public function testClassResolverShouldFindClassBasedOnSuffix() {
00018                         $this->assertEqual(Addendum::resolveClassName('ClassWithNamespace'), 'Namespace_ClassWithNamespace');
00019                         $this->assertEqual(Addendum::resolveClassName('WithNamespace'), 'WithNamespace');
00020                         $this->assertEqual(Addendum::resolveClassName('Annotation_AClass'), 'Namespace_Annotation_AClass');
00021                         $this->assertEqual(Addendum::resolveClassName('AClass'), 'Namespace_Annotation_AClass'); // this is crucial
00022                 }
00023 
00024                 public function testClassResolverShouldTriggerErrorOnCommonSuffix() {
00025                         $this->expectError("Cannot resolve class name for 'CommonSuffix'. Possible matches: Namespace1_CommonSuffix, Namespace2_CommonSuffix");
00026                         Addendum::resolveClassName('CommonSuffix');
00027                 }
00028         }
